Misty,
 
Thanks for taking the time to post those files. I seem to get a fe=
w names of persons that are doing box research
But I mostly get my name Ste=
ve's name and especially Frank sumptions name. I believe it is to let us kn=
ow it is not radio fragment
and also to perk up our listening.
 
Bruce

Bru=
ce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team

m: bulletbabea@...: Tue, 27 Nov 2007 08:29:17 -0800Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] RCA 12-470 RADIO SHACK HACK FILES





Hiya Buce
 
I hear almost a=
ll of those as labled. The help me file I hear different I hear "that you b=
ruce?" 
 
Mike had some good results on that one too. I heard your name men=
tioned on his video twice as well as his name. I clipped those out for you =
guys and posted to a previous email post. But I will restick them to this e=
mail for you. 
 
Sorry I didnt clip it all for yall  just wanted to show hi=
m where I heard your names so he could maybe hear it too, which he does. 
 =

Thats one thing I like about any method I use they are always very direct =
with thier approach and use my name or others to get the point across bette=
r.
 
Mistybhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:


HEY GUY'S=
 OF COURSE I HAVE MY RS HACK AND GETTING RESULTS THE FIRST DAY.MY INITIAL O=
PINION OF THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS LITTLE GEM IS FROM TWO EXPERIMENTAL SESSI=
ONS ONE PERFORMED BY STEVE HULTAY AND MYSELF AND THE OTHER BY MYSELF ALONE.=
 THE FILES I HAVE POSTED ARE GLEENED FROM ONLY THE FIRST MINUTE OR SO OF A =
TEN MINUTE RECORDING.PLEASE TAKE A MINUTE TO LISTEN AND POST YOUR FEEDBACK.=
THE FILES ARE POSTED IN THE FILE SECTION UNDER: 11-26-07_radio shack hack f=
iles_Bruce AFTER DOING ONLY ONE RECORDED SESSION AND TWO SESSIONS TOTAL. I =
AS A SERIOUS BOX RESEARCHER WITH EVRYDAY EXPERIMENTING ON FRANK'S,JOE'S AND=
 NOW THE RADIO SHACK HACK BOX CAN PREMATURELY SAY THAT THIS RADIO MAY BE SM=
ALL IN SIZE BUT IT PACKS A BIG PUNCH ! AND IT WAS UNDER OUR VERY NOSES ALL =
THE TIME. THANKS TO SUM DUC FOR HIS INSIGHT IN DISCOVERING IT.AT THE RISK O=
F SOUNDING REDUNDENT I MUST REITERATE THIS RS BOX WILL HOLD IT'S OWN WITH T=
HE BIG BOYS. THE RESULTS AND LEVEL OF COMMUNICATION BOTH IN REAL TIME DURIN=
G A SESSION AND WHAT IS MISSED BY OUR RUDIMENTARY HUMAN HEARING AND CAUGHT =
ON A RECORDING RIVALS OR MAY EVEN GIVEN ENOUGH TIME FOR FREQUENCY IMPRINTIN=
G BY OUR SPIRIT FRIENDS AND PROPER RESEARCH METHODS WILL SURPASS JOE'S BOX =
AND PULL A CLOSE SECOND TO FRANK'S BOX. AS A MATTER OF FACT MY FIRST IMPRES=
SION OF THE RS BOX WAS REMINICENT OF THE AM LINEAR MODE OF MY FRANKS BOX #1=
2. LET'S FACE IT A FRANKS BOX IS A FRANKS BOX IN AS NO TWO ARE EXACTLY THE =
SAME THAT IS WHAT MAKES THEM SO UNIQUE AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I BELIEVE A S=
MALL PART OF FRANK HIMSELF TRANSFERS INTO EVERY BOX HE MAKES AND HE IS VERY=
 WELL RESPECTED ON THE OTHER SIDE FROM WHAT MY GUIDES AND TECHS TELL ME.I H=
AVE NOT HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO USE RON RICKETS MINI BOX YET BUT I AM HEARIN=
G VERY GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT'S PERFORMANCE ALSO AND CAN NOT WAIT TO EXPERIME=
NT WITH IT.I THINK OUR FRIENDS ON THE OTHER SIDE ARE FINALY DECIDING TO PUS=
H FORWARD WITH THE COMMUNICATION PROCESS AND ALLOW IT TO BECOME ACCESABLE T=
O MANY MORE PEOPLE. WHAT THEY HAVE CONVEYED TO ME OVER NUMEROUS SESSIONS IS=
 THE DESPERATE AND INTRIGAL NEED FOR COMBINED HARMONY AMONG RESEARCHERS AND=
 COMMUNICATORS. THE MORE MINDS THAT ARE THINKING AND MOVING TOGETHER FOR TH=
IS COMMON GOAL THE STRONGER THE SPIRITS ABILITY TO COMMUNICATE AND THEY WIL=
L HELP WITH DEVELOPE MENT OF THE TECHNOLOGY SO THINGS ARE LOOKING UP AND HE=
ADING TO THE FUTURE. WHAT I HAVE GATHERED OVER MANY SESSIONS IS THEY DEFINA=
TELY WANT THE WORD AND THE TECHNOLOGY SPREAD TO AS MANY AS ARE WILLING TO A=
CCEPT IT WITH AN OPEN MIND. I AM RATTLING ON AND HAVE DRIFTED FROM MY ORIGI=
NAL POINT WHICH WAS, THIS RADIO SHACK BOX IS AND WILL BE A VERY IMPORTANT A=
ND USEFULL TOOL IN FURTHERING OUR COMMUNICATION PROCESS.THANKS FOR LISTENIN=
G.BRUCE
